popup.ranking: Data in the rankings are collected from 19.08.2024

preview.title: Preview version!
preview.description: The site is in version V3-PREVIEW, may contain errors. I will be grateful for reporting all errors on the project page (git.alekswilc.dev) or in a private message on discord - alekswilc. Stay tuned!

home.title: Simrail Stats
home.description: Simrail Stats - The best SimRail logs and statistics site!

footer.thanks: Special thanks to <bahu>BAHU.PRO hosting</bahu>, <simrailelite>Simrail ELITE discord</simrailelite>, Simrail community and my girlfriend
footer.author: Created by <anchor>{{author}}</anchor> with ❤️ for the Simrail community

error.description: Check your internet connection and refresh the page

notfound.title: Profile not found
notfound.description: Player's profile could not be found or the player has a private Steam profile.

blacklist.title: Unable to display profile
blacklist.description: The player's profile could not be displayed due to active moderator actions.

profile.info: Note: We have been collecting statistics since 13/12/2024.

notfound.title: Record not found
notfound.description: This record could not be found.

blacklist.title: The record cannot be displayed
blacklist.description: This record could not be displayed due to active moderator actions.

toasts.report: The outpost exit data has been copied to your clipboard, you can use it to submit to the #multiplayer-help-requests channel on the official simrail Discord server. Don't forget to add a reason for the report!

modal.title: Are you sure?
modal.description: This action will permanently clear user statistics.

modal.title: Are you sure?
modal.description: This action will hide user profile from displaying in the leaderboard.
